author: Associated Press
title: Officer Dead, Another Injured in Nova Scotia Gas Station Shooting: Canadian Police
description: A Canadian police officer is dead and another injured after a shooting rampage Sunday in Nova Scotia, a senior police official said.
content:
(ENFIELD, Nova Scotia) — A Canadian police officer is dead and another injured after a shooting rampage Sunday in Nova Scotia, a senior police official said.
Brian Sauvé, President of National Police Federation, confirmed the death the injured officer.
